title: ‘Degrading’ tabloid column on Meghan earns British TV personality a censure
description: A column by TV personality Jeremy Clarkson about Meghan Markle in The Sun has been deemed sexist and a “serious breach" of editorial standards by Britain's press regulator.

title: Tensions high in France on day of funeral of teen shot by police
description: A funeral for the teen, identified only as Nahel M., is expected to be held in Nanterre, Paris on Saturday. Almost 1,000 people were detained amid protests overnight.

title: How climate change inflames extremist insurgency in Africa
description: Declining harvests and dwindling fish hauls make Boko Haram appealing for young men in the Lake Chad region.

title: Ukraine live briefing: U.S. mulls sending Kyiv cluster bombs; possible new Wagner camp seen in Belarus
description: While the U.S. says Ukraine has an increasing need for the munitions, Washington has concerns about the optics and potential long-term harm for civilians.

title: Settler violence in Israel opens a new split in Netanyahu’s government
description: The recent spate of settler attacks on Palestinian villages in the West Bank is deepening fissures in Israel’s right-wing government.

title: After mutiny, Kremlin looks to unwind holdings tied to Wagner mercenary boss
description: Russia used Prigozhin to stir tumult worldwide, including election meddling in the U.S. and proxy wars in Africa. Now, the Kremlin is dismantling his empire.

title: U.S. poised to give Ukraine controversial cluster bombs
description: The Biden administration is pushing lawmakers and allies to put aside human rights concerns as regular ammunition stocks are depleted.
